summary: The diff introduces a centralized branding constant (APP_BRANDING) and updates Header/Footer/Dashboard/DiagnosticsBar to use it, but the evidence provided does not show updates to the HTML document title/metadata or the boot fallback screen text, nor does it demonstrate the startup identifier rollback/mount behavior required by REQ-2.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore the app’s visible name/branding everywhere it appears so it matches Version 14 (or lower), including at minimum the HTML document title and metadata and the boot fallback screen title text.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows branding updates in in-app components (Header/Footer/Dashboard/DiagnosticsBar) and a new appBranding constants file, but does not show any change to frontend/index.html (title/meta) or any boot fallback screen markup/text.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions frontend/index.html but is truncated and no actual index.html diff is shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit and revert any name-derived identifiers that can break loading when renamed (startup-referenced build identifier strings, hostname/app identifier derivations used in links, or other name-coupled values referenced at startup) and ensure the app mounts and the boot fallback hides normally.
missing_requirements.reason: While an identifier constant is added (APP_BRANDING.identifier) and the footer uses hostname/identifier for a UTM parameter, the diff does not show changes to startup wiring, mount signaling (`app-mounted`), boot fallback hide logic, or any specific reverted startup-time identifier strings that could have caused loading failures.
evidence: frontend/src/lib/appBranding.ts (adds identifier but does not show startup usage)
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx (derives a tracking parameter from hostname/identifier)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (references frontend/src/main.tsx and frontend/index.html, but no corresponding diffs are shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed outbound referral tracking URL construction using caffeine.ai with UTM parameters derived from hostname/app identifier.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on restoring naming consistency and preventing startup load breakage; adding or modifying referral/UTM tracking is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced new branding fields beyond the app name itself (tagline, emoji icon) as part of APP_BRANDING.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 requests restoring the app’s visible name/branding to match Version 14 naming; the diff adds additional branding elements (tagline/icon) that are not explicitly requested in the requirements.
